text: Harry Allison Johnston II (December 2, 1931 - June 28, 2021) was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Florida. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in West Palm Beach, Florida. Johnston represented Florida's 14th congressional district and 19th congressional district from 1989 to 1997. Johnston died on June 28, 2021 in West Palm Beach at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from West Palm Beach, Florida
title: Harry Johnston (politician)
